# mssql Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# mssql below 2012 is not supported yet.

provider "mssql" {

  user_name = "sa"
  password = "example"
  url = "example.database.windows.net"
  
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **password** (String)
- **url** (String)
- **user_name** (String)
